I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a cinema before. How was The Dark Knight Rises then? Just seen it too, my thoughts: Was this more or less of a Bluray movie? The amount of talking in this was over the top. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back again to watch it.
I was repelled by this version of the fable : parody or adoration ?
To be honest I think there’s a pratical goal ! This movie will bring the Hello Kitty participants found on Steam and Grin. But this time… who

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures across the Universe in their space ships flying overhead with their telescopic eyes spying on us dishnowened creatures. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to score big points with most fans of the genre just because they will be happy to see that one and only Joe still kicking up ass and taking names with his martial arts prowess.
